title: Person of Interest: Bear's Bath
author: The69Observer
comment: This was one of Michael Emerson's favorite scenes apparently.
I would watch a show with just those two and bear xD
"He's your dog." I love how Finch says that.
anybody notice there are rarely any dislikes on Bear vids??? <3
"He's your dog!" Is he Finch? Really?
description: Even a Viglante's dog needs a cleaning sometimes. The washing part is shared by John and Finch. However, who will dry the dog ?
